Recommendations: Linkages with local, national, foreign and non-governmental agencies may be institutionalized.
Maximum participation of faculty in extension activities may be strengthened and encouraged.
Faculty and students may be given the opportunity to improve their skills in doing extension work. In-service training and workshops may be organized to improve their extension capabilities.
Periodic monitoring, evaluation and impact assessment of extension projects and activities may be conducted.
It is suggested that extension project and activities is sustainable.
Students may be given the opportunity to improve their skills in doing extension work. It is suggested that they may include students in planning and implementation of extension activities.
